content: Head straight up the narrow path, and when you're close to the cart, look to the left to find an alcove you can dip into to avoid the fire attacks that also has a green Wisp in it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Height of Ember' and the sub-subsection 'Yoaguai Chief - Gray-Bronze Cart'.
The content is as follows:
Head straight up the narrow path, and when you're close to the cart, look to the left to find an alcove you can dip into to avoid the fire attacks that also has a green Wisp in it.
